short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change zoom settings smoothly with a standard slider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A super easy way to change the zoom setting level of a page. Syncs perfectly with chromes zoom settings and provides a more granular approach to changing the zoom level. 

Just click on the popup and you'll know what to do next (but if you still don't know, just slide the slider up and down to change zoom levels).

The slider goes up in increments of 5%.
